Welcome To My Portfolio!

Hello! I am a Master’s student in Data Science at Indiana University with a strong interest in econometrics, machine learning, algorithms, statistics, and building scalable systems. I enjoy writing production-quality code to develop models and end-to-end data pipelines that operate on large datasets, analyze economic patterns, and forecast outcomes to support data-driven decision-making. I am actively seeking full-time roles in data science, quantitative analytics, data engineering, or related fields.
